value.title: How to easily sketch your Power BI reports with your remote team/ customers #StayHome
value.excerpt: As a lot of us are working from home, and more and more meetings are online, how do we gather the requirements from our customers /colleagues for our power bi reports?  In this video I will show you one way to do it with tools you already have in your computer (most likely).   Unfortunately they deleted

value.title: How to pick STUNNING colors for your Power BI reports! üòç
value.excerpt: There are many tools that help you create color palettes, but there is a lot more needed than just a tool to get it right. In today's video, I will show you how I create color palettes, the tools and tricks I use to make my reports shine like a star!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: How to solve sort order error: "We cannot sort the 'A' column by 'B'. You cant have more than ..."

Choose a different column for sorting or update the data in 'Year'."  In this video I show you why you get it and how to

value.title: Import data from Facebook API in Power BI (Part 2)

We also show you how to get all comments from posts into Power BI. Enjoy!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center:

value.title: Import your excel model into Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you spent hours creating an excel model with Power Query and PowerPivot and you or your company has now decided to move to Power BI?  Well, don't worry, you can import your excel models in Power BI and most of it will be imported, included the visuals if you created them using Power View, Yey!

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. For example, if you were displaying revenue by country and had no sales in Norway, then Norway would not appear anywhere in your visualization.  In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show

value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!
